titleStmt.title: A letter of a French Protestant to a Scotishman of the Covenant VVherein one of their chiefe pretences is removed, which is their conformitie with the French churches in points of discipline and obedience.
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Young, and R. Badger,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
